message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm asking for $1,800,000 to start the conversation. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher.

Bob, I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is tempting,  the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. I believe this reflects a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1,400,000 and $1,650,000, so I'm offering $1,550,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
